## StateManager.dispatchEvent() method

Dispatches an event. This can update the [State](./answers-headless.state.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dispatchEvent(type: string, payload?: unknown): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string | The type of action to dispatch |
|  payload | unknown | The payload of the action to dispatch |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
